ja60:1.1: The story is similar to the previous, except here the instrument is a conch or horn, and the father is the overplayer, not the son.
ja60:1.2: [mil3.1.4:6.8]() discusses what happens when a horn player breathes out too much.
ja60:1.4: _Dhamaṁ_ is nominative singular. We can capture the pun between _dhama_ (“blowing”) and _vidhamī_ (“squandered it”, “blew it”).
